info.title: Tekton Hub
info.description: HTTP services for managing Tekton Hub

get.description: Return status 'ok' when the server has started successfully

post.description:
Refresh a catalog by its org and name

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `catalog:refresh`

get.description: List all categories along with their tags sorted by name
Find resources by a combination of name, kind and tags

parameters.name: kinds
parameters.description: Kinds of resource to filter by

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tags associated with a resource to filter by

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of resources to be returned

parameters.name: match
parameters.description: Strategy used to find matching resources

get.description: Find a resource using its version's id

parameters.name: versionID
parameters.description: Version ID of a resource's version

get.description: Find resources using name of catalog, resource name and kind of resource
Find resource using name of catalog & name, kind and version of resource
Find a resource using it's id

Find user's rating for a resource

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `rating:read`

put.description:
Update user's rating for a resource

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `rating:write`

get.description: Find all versions of a resource by its id
List all resources sorted by rating and name

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of resources to be returned

get.description: JSON document containing the API swagger definition

put.description:
Create or Update an agent user with required scopes

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `agent:create`

jwt_header_Authorization.description:
Secures endpoint by requiring a valid JWT retrieved via the /auth/login endpoint.

**Security Scopes**:
  * `rating:read`: Read-only access to rating
  * `rating:write`: Read and write access to rating
  * `agent:create`: Access to create or update an agent
  * `catalog:refresh`: Access to refresh catalog
jwt_header_Authorization.name: Authorization
